metadata.title: CVE-2015-2936 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki 1.24.x before 1.24.2, when using PBKDF2 for password hashing,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) viaa long password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
